snippet: As the last home player left in the singles draw, Richard Gasquet hopes a partisan crowd will help cheer him to victory in his first French Open quarter-final when he takes on Britain's Andy Murray on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: As the last home player left in the singles draw, Richard Gasquet hopes a partisan crowd will help cheer him to victory in his first French Open quarter-final when he takes on Britain's Andy Murray on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Gasquet Hopes for 'Davis Cup' Crowd to Help Conquer Murray
headline.main: Gasquet Hopes for 'Davis Cup' Crowd to Help Conquer Murray
